definitions.definition: Unsteady , random ; prone to unexpected changes ; not consistent .
examples: Henry has been getting erratic scores on his tests: 40% last week, but 98% this week.

definitions.definition: Deviating from normal opinions or actions ; eccentric ; odd .

main_definition: Unsteady , random ; prone to unexpected changes ; not consistent .
secondary_definitions: Deviating from normal opinions or actions ; eccentric ; odd .
